to make a joke while looking or seeming serious: "The secret to a long life is not dying," she deadpans. These are British comedians deadpanning with their usual dry wit.
More examplesFewer examples"Yeah, don't you recognise me?" she deadpans.He deadpanned to the crowd, "I hope you approve.""That was easy," he deadpanned.She deftly deadpans one-liners.He deadpans beautifully in the role.
